DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the efficacy of chest physiotheray treatment in preventing pulmonary complications and weaning faliure, in extubated critically ill patients.
DOC.brief_title: Post Extubation Chest Physiotherapy in ICU
DOC.criteria: ICU patients, over 18 years' old, mechanical ventilated over 24 hours, candidates for extubation Mental conditions, retardation, dementia, pregnancy, reintubated patients
